#Read in data

```{r}
dat<-read.csv("InputData/ArgosData_2016_03_14_22_54_50.csv")
head(dat)
```

#Time

Need to check time zone

```{r}
dat$Time<-strptime(dat$Loc..date,format="%d/%m/%Y %H:%M",tz = "GMT")
dat$Month<-months(dat$Time)
dat$Hour<-hours(dat$Time)
dat$Day<-days(dat$Time)
dat$Year<-years(dat$Time)
qplot(x=dat$Time,y=1)
```

#Descriptive Statistics

## Time Between Records
```{r}
for (x in 2:nrow(dat)){
  dat$DTime[x]<-as.numeric(difftime(dat[x,"Time"],dat[x-1,"Time"],units="mins"))
}
```
